jobs.title: General Inquiry
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Base, we’re reimagining how people connect - through extraordinary, curated experiences that turn strangers into friends. We’re growing fast, and while we have specific roles posted, we know the best people don’t always fit into tidy boxes.

If you’re the kind of person who makes things happen, brings people together, and thrives in high-energy, purpose-driven environments, we want to hear from you. Maybe you’re a connector, a deal-maker, an experience creator, or someone with a skill we haven’t even thought of yet - as long as you can make Base better, you belong here.

Don’t wait for the “perfect” job posting. If you believe you can help us grow, deepen our community, and elevate the Base experience, pitch us your vision. Send your info over to careers@base.club
jobs.descriptionPlain:

If you’re the kind of person who makes things happen, brings people together, and thrives in high-energy, purpose-driven environments, we want to hear from you. Maybe you’re a connector, a deal-maker, an experience creator, or someone with a skill we haven’t even thought of yet - as long as you can make Base better, you belong here.

Don’t wait for the “perfect” job posting. If you believe you can help us grow, deepen our community, and elevate the Base experience, pitch us your vision. Send your info over to careers@base.club

jobs.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
What You’ll Do Here

  • Develop full-stack applications, delivering high-performance and seamless user experiences.

  • Play a pivotal role in shaping the application architecture with a focus on scalability, performance, and clean code.

  • Collaborate with design and product teams to implement innovative features leveraging user feedback and data.

  • Integrate third-party SDKs and APIs (e.g., analytics, payments, auth) to enhance application functionality.

  • Deliver exceptional code quality, incorporating advanced animations and transitions to create intuitive user interactions.

  • Proactively troubleshoot and resolve application issues throughout the development lifecycle to ensure performance, stability, and the best possible user experience.

What You Bring to the Table

  • Proven experience leading or participating in large development projects from conception through launch.

  • Expert-level knowledge in React with hands-on experience in Node, TypeScript, REST APIs, and GraphQL

  • Strong knowledge of testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Maestro) to ensure reliability and integrity of the application.

  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, adept at working in a remote-first team environment.

  • Strong visual sensibility and design intuition, bringing a creative and thoughtful approach to UI/UX design, animations, and visual interactions.

  • Self-motivated and thrives in an autonomous environment, capable of driving projects forward independently while aligning with company priorities.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent experience.

  • 5+ years of experience in full-stack application development, with strong proficiency in React and JavaScript/TypeScript.

  • Proficiency in modern front-end best practices, component-driven architecture, and performance optimization.

  • Experience with Git and familiarity with modern authorization mechanisms (e.g., JSON Web Token).

  • Familiarity with backend integration using RESTful and GraphQL APIs.

  • Bonus: Exposure to Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL for light full-stack work.

Bonus Points

  • Contributions to open-source projects or a strong GitHub portfolio.

  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and deployment automation.

  • Previous experience in a tech startup or agile development environment.

  • Proficiency in React Native a strong plus

Compensation

  • Full-time, remote position.

  • Expected salary range: $110,000 – $180,000/year, depending on experience and seniority.

  • Health insurance.

  • Competitive equity package.
jobs.descriptionPlain:
WHAT YOU’LL DO HERE

 - Develop full-stack applications, delivering high-performance and seamless user experiences.

 - Play a pivotal role in shaping the application architecture with a focus on scalability, performance, and clean code.

 - Collaborate with design and product teams to implement innovative features leveraging user feedback and data.

 - Integrate third-party SDKs and APIs (e.g., analytics, payments, auth) to enhance application functionality.

 - Deliver exceptional code quality, incorporating advanced animations and transitions to create intuitive user interactions.

 - Proactively troubleshoot and resolve application issues throughout the development lifecycle to ensure performance, stability, and the best possible user experience.


WHAT YOU BRING TO THE TABLE

 - Proven experience leading or participating in large development projects from conception through launch.

 - Expert-level knowledge in React with hands-on experience in Node, TypeScript, REST APIs, and GraphQL

 - Strong knowledge of testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Maestro) to ensure reliability and integrity of the application.

 - Excellent communication and collaboration skills, adept at working in a remote-first team environment.

 - Strong visual sensibility and design intuition, bringing a creative and thoughtful approach to UI/UX design, animations, and visual interactions.

 - Self-motivated and thrives in an autonomous environment, capable of driving projects forward independently while aligning with company priorities.


QUALIFICATIONS

 - Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent experience.

 - 5+ years of experience in full-stack application development, with strong proficiency in React and JavaScript/TypeScript.

 - Proficiency in modern front-end best practices, component-driven architecture, and performance optimization.

 - Experience with Git and familiarity with modern authorization mechanisms (e.g., JSON Web Token).

 - Familiarity with backend integration using RESTful and GraphQL APIs.

 - Bonus: Exposure to Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL for light full-stack work.


BONUS POINTS

 - Contributions to open-source projects or a strong GitHub portfolio.

 - Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and deployment automation.

 - Previous experience in a tech startup or agile development environment.

 - Proficiency in React Native a strong plus


COMPENSATION

 - Full-time, remote position.

 - Expected salary range: $110,000 – $180,000/year, depending on experience and seniority.

 - Health insurance.

 - Competitive equity package.

jobs.title: City Coordinator - Chicago
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Responsibilities:

  • Office Operations: Keep our day-to-day operations running smoothly, from managing printing, filing, supply runs, and keeping the space stocked and ready for events.

  • Event Support & Guest Experience: Support live events by helping with check-ins, room setup, vendor coordination, and real-time troubleshooting.

  • Deliveries & Local Errands: Handle timely pickups and drop-offs for supplies, signage, or event materials. You’ll be our point of connection between venues, vendors, and the Base team.

Experience:

  • 2+ years of experience in an administrative heavy role, in hospitality, event coordination/planning, or other relevant experience

Qualifications:

  • Ultra-Organized: You’re detail-driven, efficient, and able to juggle multiple moving pieces.

  • Quick on Your Feet: You’re comfortable with change and thrive when you’re solving problems in real time.

  • Personable & Professional: You know how to show up representing Base - whether it’s greeting a guest, coordinating with a vendor, or supporting our internal team.

  • Self-Starter: You anticipate needs, follow through flawlessly, and stay ahead of the curve.

  • Contingency Planning Skills: You think ahead and manage unexpected changes or challenges easily.

  • Schedule Flexibility: You’re available for weekday office support and evening events.

  • Creative Thinking: You bring fresh ideas to how we welcome guests and run events.

Bonus points:

  • Access to a car to drive around town

Comp:

  • $25/hour

Email: careers@base.club
